summary: A message from headquarters directs stations in El Salvador and Guatemala to arrange briefings for President Rivera and Chief Peralta on Cuban subversion, as well as exploring potential pitches to AMMUG leads.
summary_one_paragraph: This message, dated August 27, 1964, instructs stations in San Salvador and Guatemala City to organize briefings for President Rivera and Chief Peralta regarding Cuban subversion following Schwill's travel to the region. It also tasks the stations with setting up roundtable discussions on the same topic, involving station chiefs, local liaison chiefs, and staff employees. Furthermore, the message directs the El Salvador station to explore potential 'pitches' to AMMUG leads, suggesting headquarters is prepared to immediately make AMMUG available for such pitches.
title: Message Regarding Briefings on Cuban Subversion in El Salvador and Guatemala
